WEBSITE EVEN STATES MAY CAUSE INABILITY TO STEER YOUR CAR AND LETTER EVEN STATES MAY CAUSE AN ACCIDENT. BUT THEY CAN'T HELP ME RIGHT NOW? SO DISAPPOINTED IN FORD! IF SOMETHING HAPPENS TO ME OR MY FAMILY FORD WILL PAY.
